description: This file defines a custom React hook named useIntersection that uses the IntersectionObserver API to detect when a DOM element enters the viewport. It provides a ref to attach to target elements and a boolean state indicating visibility. The hook supports options for the observer and an 'once' parameter to observe only the first intersection.

methods.name: useIntersection(options = { threshold: 0.2 }, once = true)
methods.description: A React hook that observes when a DOM element enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver. It returns a ref to be attached to the target element and a boolean indicating if the element is intersecting.
